content: लस् I. {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (लसति, लसित) {@--1@} To shine, glitter, flash; मुक्तहरेण लसता हसतीव स्तनद्वयं <ls>K. P. 10</ls>; करवाणि चरणद्वयं सरसलसदलक्तकरागं <ls>Gīt. 10</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 16</ls>; <ls>N. 22. 53.</ls> {@--2@} To appear, arise, come to light. {@--3@} To embrace. {@--4@} To play, frolic about, skip about, dance. {@--5@} To sound, resound. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (लासयति-ते) {@--1@} To cause to shine, grace, adorn. {@--2@} To cause to dance. {@--3@} To exercise an art.
